titles.title: A bill for the relief of Gagik Barseghian.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law.
Reported to House by House Committee on The Judiciary. Report No: 100-597.
Called up by House on Call of Private Calendar.
Received in the Senate. Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.

calendar.text: Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 731.

action.text: Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 2/8/1988--Introduced. Declares a named individual to have satisfied certain requirements of the Immigration and Nationality Act relating to eligibility for naturalization.
